text: The 1921–22 Eintracht Frankfurt season was the 22nd season in the club's football history. In 1921–22 the club played in the Kreisliga Nordmain, the top tier of German football. It was the club's 3rd season in the Kreisliga Nordmain. The season ended up with Eintracht winning Kreisliga Nordmain for the third time in a row. In the Nordmain decider match didn't qualify for the South German championship. ==Matches== ===Legend=== ===Friendlies=== ===Kreisliga Nordmain=== ====League fixtures and results==== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ===South German championship round (Northern section)=== ====Fixtures and results==== ===South German Cup DFB-Pokal / SFV-Pokal=== ==Squad== ===Squad and statistics=== |} ===Transfers=== In: Out: ==See also== * 1922 German football championship == Notes == ==Sources== * ==External links== * Official English Eintracht website * German archive site 1921-22 Category:German football clubs 1921–22 season
